messages.title: STANDING WITH THERESA MAY
messages.content: John Glen is standing with Theresa May to provide strong and stable leadership in the national interest.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: John Glen seeks to continue creating a stronger economy for Salisbury and South Wiltshire.
Focus on improving educational opportunities, with reference to grammar schools policy.
John Glen wants to ensure Salisbury receives strong representation and speaks of past investment.

issues.brexitEurope: Strong and Stable leadership for Brexit negotiations.
issues.education: Improving educational opportunities, including supporting grammar schools.

leaflet.personalStatement: John Glen speaks about continuing to serve Salisbury and providing strong representation.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fighting for Salisbury's priorities, investment in city's health and transport, support for veterans and campaigning on international human rights.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes a figure of Theresa May with a message of support for her leadership on the front page.
